attributes.additional_details: A close vote, leaves some people wanting to change their mind. People haven’t taken into account the long term effects of this decision.
attributes.background: The influence of immagration has had an impact on people ‘thinking’ leaving Europe was a good thing. Now that the effects are being faced (such as increase in sugar tax), the consequence are now known. A re-vote would do the country good, and allow time to make a sensible decision.
